website_summaries.verdict: Buddy Biscuits are a simple, sizable, and tasty treat that no dog will pass up.
pros: The perfect size – not too big or small
Plenty of biscuits in each box, and dogs absolutely love the taste
cons: The final quarter of the bag has its share of broken Buddy Biscuits

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates these.
customer_reviews.text: They don't smell bad, but the dog hates them. She eats anything. Anything but these. She ate a paper towel the other day just because it had a dime-size spot of chicken grease on it. She spat this treat out fast, growled at it, and walked away. On another note: these also came in the same box as two boxes of canned cat food. These were stuffed in between the boxes of cat food. Most of them were pulverized. Would suggest ordering them separately from anything heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Whatever, they’re cheap
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them, but he’s also never met a food he doesn’t like. Most of them were broken on arrival and the mess of tiny pieces and crumbs left is a pain. Also don’t like that the bag isn’t resealable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: They are burnt!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have LOVED Buddies brand treats always, but I normally get them from another online source. Since i was in a hurry and they were out, I got a box from Amazon in peanut butter. I opened them up last night and they are burnt! ALL of them burnt black! Could not believe. Needless to say some quality control didn't happen here! Love Buddies, but won't go this route again!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome biscuits
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs absolutely love these biscuits; we can't keep enough of them on hand. I love that they're grain free because our oldest dog has grain allergies. I will continue to buy these because they are high quality, USA made, and our dogs love them! I don't worry at all about giving them to our dogs every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: Loved the limited ingredients then realized they use canola oil
customer_reviews.text: Loved the limited ingredients then realized they use canola oil. They assured me that theirs is expeller pressed but there is so much controversy over canola oil for dogs and so many other choices, why take the chance? My dog already has a heart condition so I have started making my own based on their ingredients, but replacing the oil with applesauce.
customer_reviews.author: kr

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE USA Natural INGREDIENTS GRAIN FREE DOG TREATS
customer_reviews.text: My pups have to eat grain free and we live in a very small town it is very hard to find grain free treats. They LOVED these MADE IN THE USA treats! My kids like them as they are shaped like gingerbread men. This is my first time to use a product from this company and I see they have a HUGE variety of NATURAL INGREDIENT treats and food products for my fur babies can't wait to try more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Moland

customer_reviews.title: Healthy yummy treats
customer_reviews.text: The Itty Bittys are the perfect size for smaller dogs like my yorkies and westie. It’s difficult to find dog treats that are small enough for my dogs without having to break them into small pieces. One of my dogs has pancreatitis so she cannot handle some treats so I take great care in finding food she can enjoy and digest well. My dogs have never had stomach issues with these biscuits and they enjoy eating them. These are one of my dogs favorite treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Grain free treat at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. She get sick from a lot of treats, but these seem to agree with her. They are grain free, and quite reasonably priced. If I had one complaint it would be that many break during the shipping process, but it's a cookie so I understand it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good biscuits but the small ones are super, super tiny!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for both the larger biscuits and the smaller biscuits. My dogs love both. We started with the larger ones and in this last order I got the small ones thinking they were half maybe a third of the size of the big ones. Folks I've never seen a biscuit quite so small! It looks like it was made for guinea pig not a little dog. I have two small dogs, they're not Chihuahuas but they're small. I have to give them like four or five of them. So I will not likely be reordering the smalls again but the large are great and I love the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Talisgeir

customer_reviews.title: Tiny.. soft treat
customer_reviews.text: This box will be good for a small dog, I thought I was ordering a larger variety that I usually purchase in the store, I usually give all 5 of my dogs a treat when put in there crates, if not careful they crumble in your hands fast, very delicate recipe. Therefore, great for a dog that likes soft treats In my photo you will see how tiny versus a normal box. I would order again for my tiny yorkies, but larger dogs would use box fast
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific grain free treats!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy that I found these for our dogs! One of dogs has a grain allergy making her itch for hours after eating any grain. These have been enjoyed by both of our dogs! They LOVE them! They are a big treat! I break them in half or even thirds but it lasts that much longer! Our dogs LOVE them! If your dog needs grain free treats get these Buddy Biscuts with roasted chicken a try. I think your dogs will love them!
customer_reviews.author: SForsberg

customer_reviews.title: This is the only treat my dog won't eat, and she LOVES anything peanut butter...
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Dingo for over a year now, and she is 18 months old. Of all the treats I have tried, peanut butter flavor and actual peanut butter are among her favorite things. She also loves 'nilla wafers and potato chips. Anything crunchy is a plus. Then I tried these Buddy Biscuits. After a few attempts I did get my pup to actually try and eat them. I put one on her tongue, she closed her mouth for a moment, then promptly spat it out. These are the only treats I have tried that got zero stars from my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mike'sMuZik

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dog biscuit
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs with sensitive stomachs so watch closely what treats I feed them. These made by Cloud work well and the biscuit is easily broken by small dogs. Mine range from a Maltipoo to a Rough Collie and all love these.
customer_reviews.author: tallahasseelass

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats for the Furbabies
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them. It doesn't seem to bother my GSD who is grain-free at the moment. A large number were broken but we used those for nail trimming when we dole out little treats to keep them distracted. The box was also slightly crushed on arrival. However, it was sent overseas so I won't complain too much. I would buy again though knowing that a majority of the treats will be broken.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Webster

customer_reviews.title: My beagle loves them
customer_reviews.text: The size is just right for a treat. They are dry but don't crumble easily and can be broken in half without a mess. June Bug beagle really likes the flavor of these. The gingerbread man design makes me smile. I'll be reordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves this biscuit. I love it too. The small size is perfect for a mini dachshund and because its thin I can break it easily into smaller pieces when using it for training purposes. A great yummy product.
customer_reviews.author: QB

customer_reviews.title: Very good treats for a very big dog.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for som mini training treats but found none so I tried this large ones thinking I could break them up. My dog will do anything for them. I have trying to teach him to bark for a cookie. Took 5 minutes with these treats. I bought two flavors. My dog is a 91 pound intelligent, stubborn German Shepherd Dog. I was amazed at his response to these treats. They are healthy and I feel good about giving him these baked "cookies".
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and delicious (according to dogs)
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are natural, wholesome, you can read the few ingredients they are made with and know you are picking quality treats. Our boys LOVE them. Our Whippet and Italian Greyhound go nuts when its cookie time. Their favorite treat of all. Thank you for making a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Especially good for dogs with allergies.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES these and they're especially good because she has terrible skin allergies and we need to be careful about what she eats. These are grain and poultry free and appear to be delicious. We'll have to take Daisy's word for it. I just wish they weren't an add-on item at this price; I'd probably buy them more often.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Q.

customer_reviews.title: Box might be open
customer_reviews.text: I opened my Amazon box and was surprised to find that the box of biscuits were open. That was strange and unexpected but at least the box was not squashed or damaged. Also the bag that contained the biscuits was intact and they were not broken up into little pieces. The last box I purchased the majority of biscuits was broken so at least they were not this time. I don't know if its because it was an add on item that the box may arrive squashed or open when you receive it but its like the lottery you never know what you'll get.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: My secret for good puppies!!! and the Perfect Potty/good girl!!!! Cookies!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I would have survived potty training 2 Golden pups without these. Easy to keep a few in a baggy in your pocket! Just crinkle plastic and pups are watching and waiting for your command. Easy to break off a just a tiny nibble too. Puppies LOVE THEM. I love that they are gluten free so I do not cross contaminate my food or myself.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenMom

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Just like "Humans"- it seems our environment has been playing havoc with promoting allergies in both people AND dogs- this is a great "new-ish" product. (be sure it says grain-free, gluten-free-) this company also makes gluten recipes and the boxes are almost identical! (btw- Amazon- while a favorite shopping revenue is more expensive than local grocery store)
customer_reviews.author: orchid

customer_reviews.title: VERY small but still a great choice
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has loved the larger bagged version of these for most of his life. Recently the price went out of our range. We haven't found any others nearly as good and recently switched to these. Other than their small size they are just as good as the larger bagged ones.
customer_reviews.author: 3JsMom

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved these bisquits
customer_reviews.text: Theses were loved by my canines. But the box was big and the number of biscuits was small. Wish there were more of them in the box. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JSav

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These dog treats smell like gingerbread cookies. They are grain free treats My dogs sometimes are picky when it comes to treats. However, these treats are always a welcome item.
customer_reviews.author: Raindancer

customer_reviews.title: Great grain free treat
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it. I like that I can easily break a piece into a few pieces to put in wooden puzzle toy and since they don’t know size I can give her a small piece or a few w/o the calories! Right now she’s sedentary and not burning a lot of calories but looks for the rewards!
customer_reviews.author: Eleshia L.

customer_reviews.title: second and last chance
customer_reviews.text: my 100lb dog likes these but prefers them big enough to chomp on the box was undamaged but the contents were more than 50% broken in smaller than half sizes which means they were broken before they went into the box this is the second time i've found this and last time they will get my money to bad good product horrible quality control
customer_reviews.author: loyd wayne jones

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved these cute little biscuits
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because they are made in the USA and they were kind of cute. They arrived very quickly and my dogs just love them. One stood on her back legs to beg and the other twirled in circles and barked. I am so happy to have found them and appreciate the quick delivery and the price was reasonable. Thank you and I will definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Our Boys Favorite Treats!
customer_reviews.text: These are our dogs' favorite treats! They're small dogs - 17 & 7 lbs, so the itty bitty size is perfect for them! We actually even break them up smaller, into about 4 pieces, so we can sue them for training or just regular treats. The rotisserie chicken and peanut butter are their two favorite flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Smartly CreatedTop Contributor: Scrapbooking

customer_reviews.title: Too many broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love these, and they don't care that more than half of the biscuits are broken. But I do - - it's a nuisance to scoop up the small pieces. I won't be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanna Merrie

customer_reviews.title: My girl loves them
customer_reviews.text: If my dog likes them I like them. I break them in 2. The best is that in this market manufacturers are up pricing things they know we will pay for our pups. These are priced to make them affordable and I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Good Healthy Treats...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these. Good healthy product and made in the U.S.A. to boot. We'll buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Urbanhoundmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute treats and my dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My Rotty who has a grain allergy, loves these. They are less pricey than most of the grain free treats that I have tried so I will be buying them again. The shapes are cute too, not that she ever looks at them, lol.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lefko

customer_reviews.title: CRUSHED INTO BITS
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these cookies and I usually buy them from Wal-mart. We live an hour away from the nearest Wal-Mart so I figured id try ordering from amazon. They arrived completely pulverized. I know this is supposed to be a review of the product but it looks like its happening to everyone. Otherwise my dogs love these cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Meri Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great grain free treat
customer_reviews.text: Love this grain free version for a little extra snack for my dogs! Dogs love them too, and no upset stomachs either.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: It's Dog Crack
customer_reviews.text: My dogs went nuts for this stuff. This product went waaaay too fast. They smelled very good, and were very tempting to the human giving the treats.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good treat to fit n toy
customer_reviews.text: I always on the outlook for larger treats that will still fit into toys to encourage my Rottie natural instincts. These work well in the chew toy pictured. Keeps her going for half an hour or more at times
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for Grain Free treats. Realy good size too. I have 3 dogs. A Westie, a Terrier Mix, and a great Dane. 2 cookies make it for treat handouts. I snap off the head and give that to the small dog, the medium dog gets the body and the GDane gets the second cookie. 😄 Everyone is Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cave

customer_reviews.title: My dog is happy to get a biscuit.
customer_reviews.text: Since I am not a dog, I can only sy that my dog seems to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth F. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Pet Treats!
customer_reviews.text: Grain free! Healthy dog treats that are not junk yet tasty for our dog. Just remember that healthy pet treats without all that grain fill are less per bag but less is good in these cases. We buy all our pet treats from Amazon but have now shifted to grain free treats and they are affordable. Make the conversion to healthy pet food and make your pets healthier like we are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: I received the box I ordered today and the box was less than half full and all but two cookie biscuits was broken into small pieces and a good deal of crumbs at the bottom of the package. My dogs would not even take these when offered and they eat just about anything. Total waste of money. I had also ordered dog cookies from a competitor and very few cookies were broken and my dogs love them. Don’t waste your money, purchase Blue Dog Bakery dog biscuits.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnne Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Fits in Kong Red toy Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My fussy dog loves these as she is a peanut butter lover especially when I spread some real peanutbutter on it! Plus I can squeeze these into her red kong toy cause if the shape of these.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Tassoni

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these and they are a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Poor Contion
customer_reviews.text: Received (2) boxes. Very disappoited. Most of the cookies were in pieces. Previously purchased a box of grain based Biscuits which were in perfect condition. There is a density difference in the Grain Free versus Grain based Biscuits which may be the reason. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: William Tellam

customer_reviews.title: Check the description
customer_reviews.text: I like the buddy biscuit product. Though this particular one is so small and so thin that it could be used as sprinkles on a Christmas cookie. It's that small. I would not order this again because of the size. I think buddy biscuits are a good product though. I'll just have to read closer before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ranieri

customer_reviews.title: His favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 pound Teacup Yorkie loves these treats and I feel good giving him a treat that’s grain free
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and I hooked another dog in my dog training class on them too! My dog is about 75 lbs- they work well as training treats when you want to reward them every 10 seconds but not over feed. The other dog in my class is tiny and for her they make great normal treats. I wouldn't say they are super tasty enough to serve as true "rewards" for super good behavior. For that my dog wants meat-based treats! But they are great all the same.
customer_reviews.author: paelladevalencia

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves these. She has to have a grain free diet. Her systemic yeast infection is finally gone.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these cookies
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these cookies. Yes some are broken when they arrive but its not a big deal because we have to break them up anyway. They are so large I only give them small pieces for a treat.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Old Texan's

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: My Yellow Lab loves them. But he loves anything. They agree with him, which is good. Does not make him sick. He has a bit of a sensitive tummy.
customer_reviews.author: lynnar

customer_reviews.title: my dogs a treat and you have a friend for life
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love treats. They even eat the ones that the UPS gives them. Years ago, when I gave them the cheap ones, they wouldn't eat them. So I gave a bag of treats to the UPS guy to hand out to the dogs when he delivers anywhere. Guess what? He would give them go my dogs and they would eat them. Go figure. Well, I gave them these little gingerbread men and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them and they have few ingredients, all of which are something I don't have to google.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I break them into pieces and give them out as a reward for being a good dog all day. They are grain free and have the healthiest ingredients. And they are made in America. There have been quite a few recalls on other brands. I have never seen one for these.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Few ingredients and dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: All 4 dogs love them and I love that it's few ingredients that I can actually pronounce and know what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. He has food allergies and cannot have wheat, eggs, dairy. He can, however, have these - thank goodness. Will be buying again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Colder

customer_reviews.title: My dog says "Oh boy! oh boy! Love this treat!!! More please!"
customer_reviews.text: My dog, a 6 lbs Maltese, loves these. They were bigger than I thought they would be but I just break them into pieces. There were a few broken pieces in the box but most were whole. I'll be getting more when these run out.
customer_reviews.author: Raised Country

customer_reviews.title: None of my dogs liked them
customer_reviews.text: Had my two Pomeranians try them and they spit them up and left them there, thought they were being picky but then I had my German short haired pointer try them as well and she spit them out too. Maybe just my dogs, but none of them liked them. 1 star because now I have dog treats that my dogs hate.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Only treat I buy for our dog (105# lab). ...
customer_reviews.text: Only treat I buy for our dog (105# lab). I break them into 3 or 4 pieces and he loves them. It is the only treat I have found so far that doesn't upset his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, Grain-Free Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! He can only eat grain free foods and he is allergic to many proteins but these tend to agree with him. He goes nuts for them! They are very small so I don't feel guilty giving him multiple pieces. Not to mention they are adorable little treats that look like little gingerbread men! He tends to prefer these over the soft variety.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphyre

customer_reviews.title: Daisy gives these 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Our Boxer-Pitbull LOVES these biscuits! The excitement level when she hears the box open is sooooooo cute! Dancing... Spontaneous Tricks.... Speedy Tail Wagging.... and Big Doggies Smiles come with every box!
customer_reviews.author: leemar812

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT COMES IN BROKEN PIECES AND A TON OF 'CRUMBS AND DUST
customer_reviews.text: MISTAKENLY BOUGHT THIS AGAIN ... WASNT IMPRESSED WITH THIS PARTICULAR PRODUCT. WHICH I, FOR A COUPLE DECADES, BOUGHT THRU TRADER JOES FOR MY 145LB AKITA, WHO LOVED LOVED THE ORIGINAL MOLASSES INGREDIENT 'BISCUIT'. THIS PRODUCT IS MAYBE APPROPRIATE FOR SMALL BREEDS AS A NORMAL COOKIE COULD BECOME AN 'ALL DAY SUCKER'
customer_reviews.author: stephen reed godar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small cookies for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: The cookie shapes look like tiny happy gingerbread men, and their small size is perfect for my 10-lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Crushed to a Powder by the USPS
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten these before and the dog loves them. When shipped in a padded envelope by USPS, the item arrives reduced to a powder. I understand the reason for using more padded and mylar envelopes, but this item may be best picked up at a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: AL34

customer_reviews.title: My pups say yummmmeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. My regular grocery outlet didn’t have them for several weeks and, of course, I found them on Amazon. They seem to like the chicken flavor better than the peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Dogkisser

customer_reviews.title: Good value dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Good product/ good price / not high fat content. Our dogs love this treat.
customer_reviews.author: mrsbill

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Now these are great. Small so you can give lots to your furry friends. Smell great and they like them
customer_reviews.author: John J. Dean III

customer_reviews.title: Dog used to like these now he doesn’t ....
customer_reviews.text: These dog treats used to be super good, they used to smell good like peanut butter and my dog liked them... now they reek of flour/cardboard smell and they’re really dry. My dog leaves these on the floor when offered which is *quite* unlike him. Won’t buy again which is weird... how did these change so badly???
customer_reviews.author: ThankGodforFreeShipping

customer_reviews.title: Box may be crushed on arrival
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these biscuits, I just wish for once that the box can arrive in prefect condition. Unfortunately the box always seems to be squashed in some way and many biscuits broken. This is disappointing since its a good price for them and my dog loves them. I have to buy bis biscuits because she has a tendency to swallow small treats whole so broken biscuits are not good. I would have rated the item higher if they arrived intact, but maybe that's also a reason they are an add on item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Healthy tasty snack!!
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves these and is easy on her stomach. She doesn't care if the cookie is whole or in pieces - they all taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian_Q

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I own a dog sitting business & my kids LOVE THESE. They are a very well behaved pack as the photo tells it ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality biscuit, but better to buy these at store
customer_reviews.text: Quality ingredients make this a great treat option for large dogs! Although, we won't be ordering these anymore through Amazon. Unfortunately, each time we've had these delivered by Amazon, every biscuit in the box is broken into smaller pieces. So this may be a product best purchased at your local Target than through Amazon. (My dog doesn't seem to mind the busted up biscuits, though!)
customer_reviews.author: M. WIENEKE

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, arrived fast, perfect condition, and my dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. Some of the reviews say they were burned, and I bought a few packages from a local store that were overdone. These were fine. I also ordered dog food online and it had more crumbs than usual, and I expected these treats to be the same. However, they arrived within a day, without a single broken piece, and not one overdone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Popovich

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes, we like. We call these "mailmen," to be silly. (Our dog actually likes our mailman). Good for quick positive feedback to our Cattle Dog.
customer_reviews.author: Puttie Cat

customer_reviews.title: Got 12 boxes as ordered
customer_reviews.text: Lots of complaints about number of boxes received but I ordered 12 and got 12. Product Review: my dogs love these. I have four dogs, and they all came back for seconds. The little men are about 2.5 inches and make for a large treat, so I am breaking them up.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved them! They are a good size for big dogs and healthy too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: My 15-year old shin tzu is missing half her teeth and doesn't like to chew hard treats, but she likes these! They are crunchy (good for dental health) but not TOO hard and a nice small size that she can manage. And they are just so cute!
customer_reviews.author: MMN

customer_reviews.title: All of them from the puppies to the seniors love these biscuits
customer_reviews.text: I foster dogs for a couple of rescues as well as having 3 personal dogs. All of them from the puppies to the seniors love these biscuits. And I love that they are grain free and made with good ingredients that are healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia nail chavera

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treats
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these. Also, contains no chicken or chicken byproducts which is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny training treats!
customer_reviews.text: Great little training treats! My sheltie loves them and I am able to reward good behavior whenever I see it. They are tiny,contain only 2 calories ( 1 calorie if you break them in half). Perfect for small young pups.
customer_reviews.author: agility addict

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the taste, but I am sure they are great. My dog loves it. My dog cannot eat grains, so grain free treat is so great, and cannot find at supermarket easily. I subscribe this product so that Amazon can deliver this periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Real buyer

customer_reviews.title: Got the product fast!
customer_reviews.text: Our GSD loves these, and being grain free they never upset his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Doll98

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these little fellas! Easy to break it into smaller pieces when they don't need a whole one. My box had pretty much all whole pieces. Everything was great and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Posie

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients. Broken pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the biscuits arrived all broken. This is not the first time that's happened. My dogs m ve these biscuits and the ingredients are good, but when they are all small pieces and crumbs, it makes feeding them difficult.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good dog cookies just wish there was more in the box
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I do not buy other brands after learning the hard way- my lab itched so bad she was raw
customer_reviews.text: My yellow lab is allergic to everything, but the "Buddy" treats. I do not buy other brands after learning the hard way- my lab itched so bad she was raw. She broke her skin and what a mess. With the Cloud Star "Buddy" treats my lab no longer has that issue; except, out door allergies!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lagoski

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats and I live that they're an affordable, grain-free option.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but dogs don't like them.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs don't seem to like these very well. I keep treats on hand for when I encounter the neighborhood dogs. Two of them refused to eat these, one ate it but slowly, and one ate part of it and then walked away. They are very cute, but I'm rating this on how well the dogs seem to like, or not like, them.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog with her sensitive stomach can handle these and likes them too.
customer_reviews.author: Mshl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAINING REWARDS
customer_reviews.text: oh, boy, are these little. i needed something this small as a training reward & they are working great! the dog loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: My Chihuahuas love these. They both have grain allergies so it's ...
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahuas love these. They both have grain allergies so it's hard to find treats that are grain free and that they like.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Confer

customer_reviews.title: Treats left untouched
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for two main reasons: they are grain free and at a decent price. However, these two reasons didn't matter a bit to my dog who did not care for them. He'll put one in his mouth, then drop it on the ground. Thinking the pieces may be too big than what he is accustomed to, I broke it in half for him but that didn't matter. He still left it untouched. I purchase different brands and flavors on a regular basis so he'll have something new to taste. He has liked the majority of the others but did not care for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for my puppy (smaller breed)! This is a good brand and I'm happy these are grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Loopy Jen

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my large dogs love Buddy Biscuits, especially the chicken flavor. I love that I can read the ingredient list and easily recognize each ingredient. Side note: I had to change the place where I stored our Buddy Biscuits. My dogs reached them on the back of the counter and ate the remaining half a box while I was at work!
customer_reviews.author: Shoo64

customer_reviews.title: Crushed product - poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like the taste, but very few of these came not broken into tiny pieces. Perhaps 5 or 6 of them were whole. You expect some product breakage, but this was ridiculous. I think you need better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Firth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Woof woof woof crunch crunch crunch. Oh look a squirrel! Cat! Lizard. Daddy give me more buddy biscuits!!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnR

customer_reviews.title: Rottie Approved
customer_reviews.text: Great treat fits in one I’ve been trying to find treats for takes my Rottie half hour or more to get to them. She just keeps going n going
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teeny Tiny
customer_reviews.text: These are teeny tiny as they say. My dog looked at me like really mom? Great for a small or tea cup dog. Gave a box to the neighbor for her Yorkie. I just bought more of the big ones. lol
customer_reviews.author: C Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nice treats, but not well packed.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs liked the biscuits, but the box was damaged. It was packed in a thin padded envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Altered Librarian

customer_reviews.title: NOT the same as the larger biscuits!
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised to be the same as the larger biscuits, only smaller. They are NOT the same. They are much crunchier. I expected them to be soft as the larger Buddy Biscuits are.
customer_reviews.author: Keto4Life

customer_reviews.title: Happy healthy pup!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does our chocolate Lab like these, they don't aggrivate her wheat allergy. Who even knew a dog could be allergic to wheat? Nice little reward for her, nice quality and price for me! I'll be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Shelia H

product_meta.title: Buddy Biscuits, Grain Free Oven Baked Crunchy & Teeny Treats for Small or Toy Breed Dogs, Baked in USA
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Peanut Butter| Size:14 ozOven baked just like your own homemade treats, Buddy Biscuits dog treats are packed with flavor and made with simple ingredients including natural peanut butter. They are filled with premium, healthy ingredients and contain no added gluten, corn, soy, yeast, sugar, salt, fillers, artificial flavors or additives. Give these healthy dog treats as a reward or as dog snacks between meals. Whether your dog is small, large, young, or old — they are sure to love the satisfying crunch and mouth-watering flavor. Since 1999, Buddy Biscuits dog treats have been oven baked in the USA and continue to be a family favorite! – Delicious, healthy and grain-free dog treats with a satisfying crunch – Made with just simple ingredients and real peanut butter – Oven baked, crunchy dog treats baked in USA only – Contain no added gluten, corn, soy, yeast, sugar, salt, artificial flavors and additives
feature_bullets: Included Components: Buddy Biscuits Grain Free Dog Treats, Made In Usa, Large Size Treat With Natural Peanut Butter 14 Oz

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
